main.descHero: Welcome! I am a graduate from a vocational school majoring in Computer Network Engineering, and I have accumulated several IT certificates that reflect my passion and commitment to the IT field. While direct experience is yet to be gained, my enthusiasm for learning and dedication is prepared to tackle new challenges in this field. I am excited to contribute and continue growing in the dynamic world of technology.

specialized1.title: IT Support
specialized1.description: To provide technical assistance to users, troubleshoot network, hardware and software issues, maintain system security, and ensure the smooth operation of information technology infrastructure.

specialized2.title: Frontend Development
specialized2.description: To Design and develop responsive and engaging user interfaces using web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

specialized3.title: Ethical Hacking: Pentester
specialized3.description: To safeguard computer systems and networks by identifying potential vulnerabilities through legitimate penetration testing to prevent attacks and security breaches.

exp1.title: Ninja Xpress
exp1.address: Pakemitan, Cinambo, Bandung City, West Java

desc1: Scan the package with a device scanner or special scanning device to be sorted based on
the destination of the package and so that the data is from the receipt numberautomatically input.
desc2: Then scan the package using a special computer called DWS (Dimentation, Weight, and Scanning)
to get more accurate databased on dimensions, weight, size and visual shape of a package.
desc3: Create and prepare a special barcode for each sack that will
be filled in the packagebased on data from the system.
desc4: As well as re-scanning the package using a special scanner device from the resultsDWS (Dimentation, Weight, and Scanning)
scan to enter sacks (depending on the weight and size of the package) ready to be loaded onto the truck logistics.

exp2.title: Jati kopi
exp2.address: Malabar, Lengkong, Bandung City, West Java 40282
description: Taking Orders: Receiving food and drink orders from customers.
Food Serving: Delivering food and drinks to the customers table.
Customer Service: Providing assistance, answering questions, and ensuring customer comfort.
Payment: Handling customer payments and bills.
